values.text: September 06, 2000

A friendly reminder of an

important date in our team.

On September 7,

our colleague Anastasia Charlotte

celebrates her birthday.
Anastasia Charlotte
Account Manager

Everyone, let’s congratulate Anastasia  on her bday.

The birthday party will take place in our meeting room on September 6, at 5 pm.
Yes, I will make it

Respectfully,

Lissa Harudison

HR Development Officer
Company@mail.com
